Wind energy accounts for 10: of the winter energy supply in the Texas power grid, indicating that it is not the sole source of power and therefore not "totally reliant on windmills."
The failure of other energy sources: including coal, natural gas, and nuclear, played a larger role in the outage, suggesting that renewable energy was not the primary cause.
The Green New Deal: a proposed House resolution, did not play a role in the outage as it did not pass the House and therefore has no legal power.
Experts with knowledge of the Texas ener: stating that it is "devoid of facts and removed from reality."
